description: Create column 1500 at index 1 based on column M|IDN using expression grel:forEach(forEach(cells['M|037b'].value.split('␟'),v,v.replace('; ','‡').replace(',','‡').replace('\\','‡')).join('‡').split('‡'), x, x.trim()).join('‡')
